134111111332121111112111112.content:
When you walked out into the hall, you saw Principal Awrey. As usual, he was berating Ms. Healey, the algebra teacher. For some reason, he really seemed to have it in for her.

"That jackass!", said Emily, disgustedly. Principal Awrey's ears grew long and pointy, and his mouth and nose lengthened into a donkey's muzzle.

"HEE-HAW!", he said, as he dropped to all fours. His clothing disappeared as his hands and feet turned into hooves.

"HEE-HAW!", he said, as a tail grew from his backside, completing his transformation into a literal jackass. A pack appeared on his back and a bridal and reins appeared on his head. Principal Healey took his reins and led him back to what was now her office.

"Never did like him", said Emily.
134111111332121111112111112.title: Something else

1341111113321211111121111121.content:
Emily's last class of the day was biology, taught by Mister Phillips.

"Ugh, this clown", said Emily , as she sat down. In response, Mister Phillips' skin turned chalk-white. His nose swelled up, becoming a big red bulb. His lips turned bright red, and red spots appeared on his cheeks. His hair turned into bright orange yarn, and his clothing morphed into a clown outfit.

He looked at the students, and said, "Hi, kids! Hyuk-hyuk-hyuk!:

He then took out some balls and began to juggle. He laughed again, and then walked out of the room, still juggling.

"You know", said Emily, "Not counting you, me, and Emily, there's an even number of boys and girls in this class."

"So?", you replied.

"So, there's something I want to do. You two, go stand at the back of the room."

Obediently, you and Alyson went and stood at the back of the room. At Emily's direction, the remaining boys and girls lined up on opposite sides of the room. All of the desks except one disappeared. A large top hat appeared on top of the remaining desk.

Emily addressed them all:

"Boys, that hat contains several slips of paper, each with a name of one of the girls on it. Each of you will now draw a slip form the hat."

One by one, the boys drew a slip from the hat. When they had done so, Emily spoke again:

"Alright, boys, look at the name on your slip."

The boys did so.

"You now love the girl named on your slip. and she loves you."

The slips of paper transformed into diamond engagement rings.

"Boys", said Emily, "propose to your girls."

Each boy crossed the room, and went down on one knee before his girl, asking her to marry him.The girls all blushingly said "yes".

The couples all then lined up in front of Emily. Emily smiled, and the boys' clothing transformed into tuxedos and the girls' clothing transformed into beautiful wedding gowns.

Emily raised her arms, and said:

"Young lovers, by My power as a Goddess, I pronounce you all husbands and wives. You may all kiss your spouses."

The couples all kissed, and Emily spoke again:

"You will all have long, happy lives together. I guarantee it. A luxury bus is waiting to take you on your honeymoon trip. don't worry, I've packed for you, and notified your parents. I've constructed homes for you to live in after you come back, and means for you to live on, and support your children. Have fun tonight, girls, you'll all be pregnant by tomorrow morning!"

One by one, the couples went and knelt before Emily to receive an individual blessing before leaving the room. When the room was empty. the bell rang to mark the end of the school day.
1341111113321211111121111121.title: Last class of the day

13411111133212111111211111211.content:
"Time to go home". said Emily, leading you and Alyson out of the classroom. As you left the school, you saw four girls standing in obvious distress, although the other students seemed not to notice them, instead just walking around them.

"Why won't any of you help us?", said one of the girls, an edge of fear and anger in her voice.

"Hello, ladies", said Emily, standing in front of them. The girls looked at her in fear and disgust. One, a tall blonde who seemed to be the leader. looked at Emily, and said:

"Oh, it's you, Emily", she said. "Are you behind this?"

"Behind what?", said Emily, sweetly.

"Behind our feet being stuck to the ground, that's what!", the blonde said.

"Oh, that", said Emily. "yeah, that was me."

"How?", said the blonde.

Ignoring her, Emily turned to the pair of you and said:

"Adam, Alyson, meet Pearl Grange, and her little stooges, Dayna, Letitia and Charity. They've been doing their level best to make my life miserable since kindergarten. That's why, unlike everyone else - well, besides you, Adam - that I've transformed today, I want them to know what's happening to them, and who's doing it."

"What are you talking about?", said Pearl.

"This", said Emily.

A large, ornate carriage - like what the Queen would have, if she had the money -appeared in front of the school. There were harnesses enough for four horses at the front of the carriage. You were smart enough to figure out what was going to happen next.

The four girls shrieked as their clothing disappeared, and they floated over to the front of the carriage, landing in the harnesses. Their cries of dismay became whinnies as they became the most magnificent horses you'd ever seen.

"Are they still like - themselves?", you asked.

"That's right", said Emily. "I want them to know that I own them now, that they will never escape me, and that they will spend the rest of their lives - however long I decide that will be - serving at my pleasure. "

Emily went over and stroked one of the horses' manes.

"Hey, there, Pearl", she said. "Maybe I'll find a nice stallion to breed you with, so that your children, and your children's children, and so on, will serve me...forever. Hee-hee-hee..."

Emily came back over to you.

"Don't worry", she said. "I'll let them suffer for a week, and then I'll re-write their minds, so that they love me, and being my horses fills them with joy."

Emily looked at the carriage. "Hmm, we need a driver", she said.

Just then, Christine Jeong, a pretty, intelligent Korean-American classmate of yours, came out of the school. You liked her, she had a great sense of humor, and was as sharp as a tack. Her life-long dream was to be a lawyer, and everyone agreed that she had the ability to do it. Her dream ended as her clothing transformed into a carriage driver's uniform.

"All aboard, Christine, we're ready to go!", said Emily.

"At once, My Lady", said Christine, climbing into the driver's seat. You, Alyson and Emily climbed into the carriage.

"Where to, My Lady?", asked Christine.

Emily said, "Take us..."
13411111133212111111211111211.title: Time to go home

134111111332121111112111112111.content:
As you rode home in Emily's carriage, you thought about what she had just done to Christine, and the couples she just married, and everyone else she had changed during the day. Sure they were happy with what she'd done, but only because she'd made them happy. It was a fake happiness.

"How is it fake?", she said, in response to your thoughts. "And, no, you don't have any privacy anymore, not even in your own head."

"It's fake because you imposed it on them", you said. "It wasn't a happiness they achieved or strove for. It wasn't even really a gift, it was just something you forced on them, without thinking about whether they wanted it or not."

"So what?", she replied. "An enforced happiness is still a real happiness. It's no longer possible for someone that I want to be happy to be unhappy. Right now, Christine is as happy as she can be. Here."

Suddenly, you were Christine. Life was a transcendent joy as you drove Emily's carriage, carrying out the purpose that you had been given by the goddess Herself. It was all you could do, not to sing from sheer happiness.

Just as suddenly, you were yourself, Adam, again.

"So, is she happy, or not?" asked Emily.

"OK, I grant you, she's happy", you replied. "But she's not free."

"Well", said Emily, "Setting aside the question of how 'free' she was before I changed her, 'freedom' became mine exclusively the moment I became a goddess. At that time, everyone and everything became my personal property. You all then ceased to have any rights whatsoever. My will is the only will that matters. Remember, I know what is best, because what I want is what is best. And it's not egomania, I am the most important Person there is"

How could I possibly answer that?, you thought.

"You can't", she said, sweetly. "And now, I'm horny again."

Suddenly, there were two of her in the carriage, and they spent the rest of the ride home taking you and Alyson on at the same time, after which she merged back into one again.

"Oh, look we're home!" she said.
134111111332121111112111112111.title: "...Home."

1341111113321211111121111121111.content:
Finally the carriage reached your home. Britney and Stephanie came out to greet their Mistress, as did Anna, Fatimah, Bridget and Juana. Dave, Tom, Ron and Phil came over to greet you, and Charlotte, Patricia, Elizabeth and Hiltrud came out to greet Alyson.

"Hmm", said Emily, "We need to make this place a little bigger."

Immediately, the people who had lived on either side of the Nomuras - the Davidsons and the Gilmores - came out of their houses and stood in front of Emily. They were followed by the Martinezes and the Lees, who lived on either side of your parents, and then by the McCalls, who lived across the street from the Nomuras. All in all, there were thirty of them. Emily smiled, and they all grew either older or younger, until they were all the same age as Stephanie and Britney. The men and boys turned into girls, and their clothing morphed into maids' uniforms.

Their homes, and the stretch of street between what had been the Nomura and McCall houses, shimmered and morphed into a large mansion, shaped roughly like a blocky "Y", with your parents' between the Y's arms. A large wall appeared around the mansion and your parents' smaller home, with gates in front of your parents' home, and on the side you had just come in. Christine drove the carriage into a carriage house that had appeared.

"The Nomura wing will be Mine", said Emily, "for Me and My angels. The Davidson wing will be yours, Adam, and the Martinez wing will be for your buddies. The Gilmore wing will be Alyson's, and the Lee wing will be for her friends. The rest will be jointly shared. The former owners will be your servants."

"Say, Emily" you said, "now that you've blocked this road, aren't the people who live down that end of the street going to be blocked in?"

"Yeah", said Emily. "I wanted some privacy, so I turned all their houses, and the houses for a couple square miles behind us, into swamp land, and turned all the people that live there into swamp monsters. Plus, I put a 'spell' on the swamp, so that anyone who spends more than a little time in there will turn into swamp monster themselves, and become permanent residents. Don't worry, they won't hurt anyone, and I'll control their breeding so they won't overpopulate. I may expand the swamp occasionally, if I feel like it. It'll add some local color, and we won't have people bothering us in our home. Now, I'm gong to go do some stuff, why don't you explore your new home. We'll be having dinner with your parents around six."
1341111113321211111121111121111.title: Redecoration

13411111133212111111211111211111.content:
You went into the house, finding yourself in a large hallway. Your four buddies followed behind you. Somehow you instinctively knew how to find your own "wing". When you reached it, your friends continued along to their own quarters. You looked around your new living space. You had to hand it to Emily, it was decorated exactly how you would have set it up, if you'd had unlimited money.

You went into your bedroom, and nearly jumped out of your skin as your bed and easy chair said "Welcome home, Master!" in unison.

Oh, yeah, you thought. The bed was Gabrielle, and the chair was the other girl that Emily had transformed at lunchtime.

"Oh, hi, Gabi, hi, um...chair. Sorry, I don't know your name."

"Mary Elizabeth O'Grady", the chair replied.

"Hi, Mary Elizabeth", you said, putting your bag down on your desk. "Sorry, you guys, about you being turned into furniture, and all."

"Oh,no, don't be sorry, Master", said Gabi. "Being selected to be your bed is the best thing that could ever have happened to me!"

"Yeah, me, too", said Mary Elizabeth. "So, please, Master, sit down for a bit."

"Aw, man, that would be weird", you said.

"Master, it's what I'm for", said Mary Elizabeth. "Now sit down, please."

You sat, and when you did, Mary Elizabeth sighed, orgasmically.

"Mmmmm-mmmm", she said. "That feels soooo good."

"OK, you're not helping with the weirdness factor, here, Mary Elizabeth", you said. You had to admit, though, sitting on Mary Elizabeth felt like getting a big, warm hug.

"Sorry, Master, it's just that nothing I ever felt as a human felt as good as this does."

"Wow, now I can't wait for bedtime!", said Gabrielle.
13411111133212111111211111211111.title: Exploration

134111111332121111112111112111111.content:
You chatted with Gabrielle and Mary Elizabeth for a while, but then began to feel an urge to work out. You went over to your desk, and looked into your backpack. All of your schoolbooks were gone - it looked as though you wouldn't be going back.

You wandered out of your wing into the common area - somehow you knew instinctively where to go to find a huge weight room, with every kind of facility you could imagine. Alyson, her friends and your friends were already there, as were several of the maids, who stood to one side, until needed.


One of them came over to you, carrying work-out clothes for you. To your embarrassment, you began changing in front of her. Neither she nor anyone else took any notice of this, as though it were the most normal thing in the world. You began working out. It made you feel good, mentally, physically and emotionally, more than exercise ever had before. Something Emily had done to you, no doubt.

You worked out for two hours, then all hit the showers, together. Again, everyone besides you thought this was perfectly normal. There was a certain amount of good-natured flaunting of physiques, along with some light-hearted flirting. When this led to a full-on sexual encounter between Dave and Charlotte, the others took it in stride, merely offering the occasional suggestion or critique.

It was time for dinner, next. Only you, Alyson and Emily were going to your parents' home for supper, so your various friends went off to eat elsewhere.

You and Alyson dressed for dinner, and went to Emily's wing, where she led you outside to cross the inner yard to your parents' house. You saw kangaroos and pigs and other animals from Emily's menagerie, being tended by some of the maids.

As you entered your parent's kitchen, you saw your mother leaning over the kitchen counter, with your father taking her from behind.

"Head on into the dining room, kids", your mother said, "Dinner won't be delayed by much." You supposed that you'd better get used to seeing things you would have preferred not to see.

The dining room was surprisingly like normal. The only difference was a tiny table for Amy and the other fairies.

Your parents came in a few minutes later, and maids started bringing the meal in. You were fairly certain that these were not the same maids that had been serving you - Emily must have "recruited" some more.

Dinner was as "normal" as the situation would allow. You all chatted about the gossip of the day while you ate. You and Alyson had huge appetites now. You both ate enough to feed twenty normal people.

Over dessert, your dad turned on the TV to watch the news. The news anchor, Chet Lang, turned into a human-sized penguin during a report, but never missed a beat, reporting until he lost the power of speech. While he was doing this, his co-anchor, Debbie Worthington - who was widely believed to have been hired for her looks- devolved into a Neanderthal, and her stylish clothing turned into furs.

Next, the sportscaster, Jill Hanson, turned into a human-sized snail from the waist down while she gave her report. When the weatherman, Ed Jackson, also transformed into a snail from the waist down, Jill came on camera and began mating with Ed. Ed took no notice of Jill but continued with his report. When she was done, Jill left with out saying anything.

"Say", you said, "Aren't most snails hermaphrodites?"

"That's right", said Emily. "They're both gonna have baaaabies!"

After supper, Emily shrank down until she was the same size as Amy and her friends.

"I'm gonna play with with fairies tonight", she said. "So, you guys can do what you like for the evening."

Alyson decided to stay and watch a weight-lifting tournament with your parents. You weren't up for that, so you went back to the mansion. Your buddies had paired off - or had been paired off by Emily - with Alyson's friends, and were off having a group date, so you went back to your room. You sat down on Mary Elizabeth and turned on the big screen TV which Emily had provided. It appeared that you had every possible channel available.

The first one that came on was NHK's English service. It was showing a report from a girls' school in Tokyo. As you watched, the girls all morphed into various kaiju, including Godzilla, Gamera, Mothra and others that you didn't recognize. Bizarrely, their uniforms all grew with them, presenting the unique sight of giant monsters in sailor suits.

Their teacher did not change, but instead levitated to her students' eye level, where a mecha materialized around her. You could see through one of the robot's eye holes that the teacher was inside piloting it, using it to teach her class.

You channel surfed for a while, seeing ample evidence that Emily had been busy all over the world. After you'd watched for a while, you turned off the TV.
134111111332121111112111112111111.title: Work-out time

1341111113321211111121111121111111.content:
You decided to turn in. You changed into a set of pajamas, and walked over to the bed. When you did so, the blankets pulled back by themselves.

"Thanks, Gabi", you said.

Lying in the bed, you felt like you were in a warm, friendly embrace. You rolled over on to your stomach and wrapped your arms around one of the pillows. It was attached to the bed, but you still were able to move it a little. You fluffed it up, and buried your head in it.

"Oooooh, that feels good, Master", said Gabrille. You suddenly remembered that the pillows were Gabrielle's transformed breasts. You'd been feeling her up!

"S-sorry, Gabi", you said.

"Don't apologize, Master", she replied. "I liked it."

As you lay in Gabrielle, you heard the sound of her heart beating, and the gentle rhythm of her breathing.

"Say, Gabi", you said.

"Yes, Master?"

"Do you need to eat or drink?"

"No, Master. Our Lady made me so I can survive just by breathing. I don't even need to sleep, so I can watch over you while you sleep."

You slept, a good, peaceful night's sleep. In the morning, you felt lazy, so you had a maid bring you breakfast in bed.

While you were eating, Emily came in and sat with you.

"So", you said, "Did you have fun playing with Amy and the other fairies last night?"

"You could say that", she replied. "I got all six of them pregnant. Wow, I've never seen anyone do an actual spit-take before!"

She continued, "Anyway...
1341111113321211111121111121111111.title: Bedtime

choices: Decided to explore the park further
13411111133212111111211111211111112.content:
"I'm going to be busy today", she said. "And your buddies are going to be tied up, too. Why don't you go for a walk around town?"

You took the hint and got dressed and went for a walk after breakfast. Just leaving the grounds of the mansion took a while. Once you got outside, you saw that your neighborhood was greatly changed. There were still some mundane houses, but there was all sorts of other structures as well. Oversized beaver lodges, stone houses right out of The Flintstones, pyramids, pagodas tepees, igloos and many other kinds of buildings were scattered throughout the area,

You came to a park where two teams of ordinary-looking teenage boys were playing football. As you watched, one team turned into real-life clones of the cartoon character, Kim Possible, while the other team turned into clones of Kim's arch-enemy, She-Go. As you listened to them trash talk as they played, they seemed to be playing to determine who got to be "tops". Emily's sense of humor, again, you supposed. You decided to move along.

As you moved further into the park, you saw two girls you knew, Marion Hall, a skinny brunette, and Sharlene Davis, an even skinnier blonde.

"Hey, Adam", they said in unison, and came over to talk at you. As they chattered mindlessly, their noses grew longer, becoming trunks. Two of each oftheir front teeth jutted out, becoming tusks, and their ears started to grow larger. Their skin turned gray and rough, as their bodies began to grow larger, until they were two full-sized bipedal elephants, albeit elephants with hands. (Fortunately for your sanity, their clothes had grown along with their bodies.) They continued to tag-team gossip at you, occasionally using their trunks to rip branches off the trees to munch on.

Eventually, they stopped talking long enough for you to make a polite escape. You...
13411111133212111111211111211111112.title: "...You're on your own again today."

134111111332121111112111112111111122.content:
You walked around the park some more. Apparently, the football game had ended, and the Kims must have won. At least, that would explain why the Kims had all the She-Gos on leashes as they walked by you.

After that, you came to a part of the park where there were stone tables with chessboards built into them. Two old guys who had been in the park every day since the Reagan Administration were seated at a table, playing chess and apparently not noticing that their feet had taken root in the ground.

Well, more time for them to play chess, you thought.

Further on into the park, you came to a pond. It was a quiet, peaceful place with no one around, only ducks swimming on the surface of the water.

This would be a nice place to sit and relax, you thought, if there was only a bench to sit on.

A young woman in jogging clothes came running up to you, and handed you picnic basket. Then she went and stood next to the pond and transformed into a bench with a sign on the back that said "Property of Adam MacDonald". You sighed and went and sat down on the bench.

"Good afternoon, Master", she said.

You looked in the picnic basket. It contained several of your favorite foods. Well, you were hungry. You chowed down while chatting with the bench.
134111111332121111112111112111111122.title: Decided to explore the park further

1341111113321211111121111121111111222.content:
The bench's name was Lisa Morganelli,and she'd been a freshman at the local state college until Emily had summoned her to be a bench. As it happened, her younger sister, Anne-Marie, was the student that Emily had made into Alyson's chair.

"I know you're happy with your new 'calling'", you said, "But I'm afraid that you'll be bored here. I mean, I won't be able to come down here to the park every day, you know. Won't you go stir crazy?"

"Oh, no", replied Lisa, "Our Lady has 're-wired' all of us living furniture so we won't get bored. Plus, she's given us all a sort of 'internal wi-fi so that when we're not 'on-duty', we can pull up any movie, show or book we want in our minds to pass the time, not to mention being able to go on the internet. Plus, we can communicate with each other mentally. I can talk to my sister any time I like!"

"Still, you'll be out here in all kinds of weather, and who knows who might sit on you when I'm not here?"

"Oh, I'm totally weather-proof, and anyone who sits on me that you would disapprove of will be instantly turned into a tree and planted randomly some place that needs more trees."

You could think of nothing to say to that, so you chatted with Lisa about the pond, before decoding to...
1341111113321211111121111121111111222.title: Something else

13411111133212111111211111211111112223.content:
While you were thinking about what to do next, Emily materialized and sat down next to you on Lisa.

"Lisa, will you excuse us a bit?", she said.

"Of course, My Lady", replied Lisa.

Nothing happened outwardly, but somehow you could sense that Lisa's attention was elsewhere.

"She's watching a movie with her sister", explained Emily.

"So, I see you've been busy", you said.

"That's right", said Emily. "I've sort of been 'growing in' to being a goddess. At first, I was just doing all the things that Mortal Emily had always wanted to do. Now, I'm seeing further possibilities."

"Like what?"

"You'll see", she said.

"Say. did you really get Amy and the other fairies pregnant?"

"Well, I suppose it would be more accurate to say that I possessed them while they got each other pregnant."

"How does that work if they're all girls?"

"It works how I want it to work."

"Well, if I may ask, what else have you been up to?"

Emily said:
13411111133212111111211111211111112223.title: Something else.

choices: Spend the night in the cottage
134111111332121111112111112111111122231.content:
Emily smiled, and said, "I have some things on the boil, but you'll find out when I'm ready."

"Well,then, can I ask what you meant by saying you were growing into being a goddess,and seeing things on new levels?"

"Well, when I first became a goddess, I mostly just used my powers to fulfill mortal Emily's fantasies, making you her muscular love puppet, punishing girls who'd been mean to her, and so on."

"You talk about 'mortal Emily' like she's a different person from you."

"WelI, I'm not the same person as her, not anymore. There's more difference between who she was and who I am now, than there is between an acorn and a full-grown oak tree. I grew out of her, I remember being her. But in a fundamental way, I'm not her anymore."

She sighed, smiled, and then continued.

"To be brutally honest, Emily - mortal Emily - was a fairly small-minded person, even for a human. Not bad, but not overly bright. I understood that I was no longer really her anymore when I began to process the higher levels of reality that I can see now."

"'Higher levels of reality'? What does that mean?"

"Well, look at the pond. The water is teeming with microorganisms, To them,the pond is the whole universe. They'll never really understand it, except on the most basic level, and they'll certainly never understand that it's just a small part of a small park in a small town on a small planet in a wider universe, get it?."

"Yeah, I guess."

"Now, think about the fish in the pond. The pond is their whole universe, too, but they at least have some notion that there's a world outside the pond, even though they'll never visit it or understand it. They just know that sometimes things from outside the pond carry unwary fish off, and they're never seen again. Fish don't have mythology, but if they did, they might mythologize these beings as demons, but you and I know that it's just birds that are doing it. OK, so far?"

"Yes, Ma'am."

"Good boy. Now, look at the ducks. They know that the pond is part of a larger world, a world in which there are many ponds, and all sorts of other places as well."

"Gotcha."

"Now look at you, as a human. You know, even more than the ducks do, that this pond is part of a small pond in a small park, and so on. But you know that there are other worlds besides the Earth, and other stars besides the Sun. You have a concept - albeit an imperfect one - of the greater Universe that you live in. Still with Me?"

"I think so."

"Now, My Angels - I made them as much above you humans as you are above our microscopic friends in the pond. You might take them for goddesses if I wasn't here. Nothing in this Universe could hurt them except Me, and I never would. They can roam all of spacetime under their own power. Right now, they're out exploring Reality. And yet, compared to Me,even they - and I'm not saying this to brag, or to terrify you - but, compared to Me, even they are like the microorganisms in the pond, not even beginning to suspect the wider levels of Being that I can now perceive. I haven't even to begun to explore everything that's open to Me now."

"Wow...that's...that's mind-boggling."

"Well, you did ask."

You sat there silently for a moment.

"Sorry for blowing your mind", said Emily. "Here, let me give you a nice distraction."

A cottage appeared by the lake. At the same time, your clothing turned to smoke and blew away, leaving you stark naked.

"Don't worry", said Emily, "I've placed a ward around this end of the park so no one will come along for a while. Now to show that I'm not a jealous goddess."

Two obviously female figures dressed in hooded white robes materialized in front of you. You gasped as they threw back their hoods, revealing themselves to be Aileen O'Connor and Megumi Aizawa.

Aileen was your favorite actress. Not only was she drop-dead gorgeous with long coppery-red hair that cried out to have you run your fingers through it, and the possessor of a brogue that got you all hot and bothered just hearing it, she was a damned good actress. You sought out every thing she was in, and she'd never disappointed.

Megumi was your favorite singer. She was gorgeous in her own way, a perfect little nadeshiko, outwardly demure, but with a wanton glint in her eyes. Her speaking voice also drove you wild, able to turn on a dime from naughty little girl petulance to a deep, throaty growl that was enough to make a man punch a hole in a wall. She was the lead singer of Ironlace, a Japanese metal band, and her singing voice was like a finely tuned insturment that she could manipulate to achieve any effect she wanted. She was no flavor-of-the-month idol singer, that was for sure. On top of that, she was a first-rate guitarist and and a good song-writer. too, by all accounts. (You couldn't speak Japanese, but you you'd heard good things from people who could.) You had all of their albums, even though you'd had to go to great lengths to get some of them.

"Hello, sweetie", they said in unison.

"Well, say hello to your new girlfriends, Adam", said Emily.

"Huh?", you said. She was giving them to you? The part of your brain that might have raised an objection to this went off-line abruptly, as the two girls' clothing turned to smoke and vanished, leaving them stark naked. Your decisions were now being made in that other "head", which was now rock-hard.

"Well, Meg", said Aileen, "Shall we see what our man's capable of?"

"Indeed, Eiriin-chan", replied Megumi. "We must...test...him."

Helpless to resist, you let them lead you into the cottage. Dimly, you heard Emily say:

"Don't worry about 'protection'. For now, neither of your girls will get pregnant. Not for now. Hmm, guess I better go find a pair of studs for Alyson to play with. It's only fair, after all."

You, Megumi, and Aileen spent quite some time getting to "know" one another, in the Biblical sense. Eventually, you took a break and looked around the inside of the cottage. You were on a large, comfy futon. There was a well-stocked kitchenette to one side, and small dining area. A large-screen TV took up one wall of the room. Overall, the decor was simple but pleasant. There was a door to one side, that led to a spacious bathroom, where you and your girls showered together, although you noted for future reference that there was also a spacious tub, big enough for the three of you. It occurred to you that you could spend the night there if you wanted to. On the other hand, it might be good to see what was going on at home.

After you'd showered, you'd found your clothes neatly folded on a chair, along with clothes for the two girls. Once you'd dressed, you took out your wallet and looked through it. It was stuffed with cash, and there were several credit cards with your name on them in it, as well. You could take your girls anywhere in town with this money.

You thought about it, and decided to...
134111111332121111112111112111111122231.title: "No, you may not ask."

1341111113321211111121111121111111222312.content:
In the end, you talked it over with Megumi and Aileen, and decided to walk home.

You locked up the cottage - you found the keys in your pants pocket - and went outside with your ladies. You chatted with Lisa the bench for a little bit, and then started walking through the park. As you did so, you noticed that the park seemed different, somehow. more like a forest than a well-tended park. It seemed to be bigger, too - you were pretty sure it was taking you longer to get out of the park than it should have, even if you and your women were frequently stopping to enjoy the view. There seemed to be fewer people around, as well.

You did run into Virginia Stilwell, who Emily had turned into a spider from the waist down. She was spinning an enormous web. hoping to catch some dinner. You decided not to ask what she was hoping to catch. Finally, you reached the park gate. The area outside the park was definitely different, more like a rural lane than the town street it had been earlier. The houses he saw were larger and on larger lost. Bellotti's Pizza was still there, but instead of a small storefront, it was now a large, elegant restaurant.

As you passed the elementary school. you saw two teams of eighth grade girls playing field hockey. While you watched, the players' skin turned green, and their hair turned black (those whose hair wasn't black already). Their uniforms turned into black dresses and pointed black hats, and their hockey sticks morphed into broomsticks. Laughingly gleefully, the newly-made witches took to the air and began playing sky hockey. Emily was still busy, then.

Looking up in the sky. you saw bird people, harpies, bat-people, dragons, and various other flying folks. There were also airplanes, jet car flying saucers, zeppelins and other flying objects you didn't recognize.
1341111113321211111121111121111111222312.title: Go home

1341111113321211111121111121111111222312.content:
When you got home, you took Megumi and Aileen up to your room first,and introduced them to Gabrielle the bed and Mary Elizabeth the chair. Your room had been adapted and expanded to include wardrobe space for the girls, who were now living with you.

You took them down to the common wing, which you noticed had a state-of-the-art recording studio for Megumi's use. You led them into the lounge area to introduce to Alyson and your friends. Alyson had two new boyfriend of her own: Brett Fairfield, whom you recognized as the leader singer of a band she liked, and Matt Gill, a young actor you'd heard good things about. You chatted for a while, and then you and your girls and Alyson and her boys went over to your parents' house for dinner.

You had a pleasant dinner with your family. The was no sing of Emily, but no one but you seemed to notice her absence. While you ate, your father put on the evening news. To your surprise, the anchor gave reports on events not only from around the world, but form around the Solar System, as well! There were now people living on the Moon, Mars, Venus,and several other planets and moons. as well! Emily had been busy, alright. You hoped you'd get a chance to speak to her about it at some point.
1341111113321211111121111121111111222312.title: Once you got home

1341111113321211111121111121111111222312.content:
You spent the rest of the evening visiting with your parents, and then retired to bed with your girls. The next morning, you woke up early, feeling especially refreshed. You lay still for a while, listening to the breathing of your still-sleeping bedmates.

Eventually, you decided to get up. By a minor miracle, you managed to get up without waking up Aileen and Megumi. You went to the gym, which was empty at that hour, and worked out for a while.

When you were done working out, you felt a sudden urge to go out for a walk. When you left the grounds of your estate, Emily was there outside, waiting for you. You spoke to her as the pair of you walked along.

"I see You've been busy", you said.

"That's right", replied Emily. "I wanted to make the Earth less crowded, so I made more places for people to live around the Solar System, and moved large numbers of people to them. Plus, I turned a hundred million or so of the worst people - the haters, the abusers, the oppressors, the wasters, the hoarders- into animals. I'll let them live a few thousand lifetimes as animals, and maybe let them try being humans again. Here, let's get some breakfast."

The pair of you went in to the Elm Tree Diner and had a hearty breakfast, after which you continued walking.

"As for the rest of you", she said, "I've 'evolved' you just a hair, so that you won't have any more hatred over religion or political stuff. There won't be anymore wars or similar foolishness. You'll all get along fine with the various semi-human and non-human races I've created. You're all part of a big Solar Federation, now. There will still be a certain amount of interpersonal conflict and crime - can't do away with that completely without taking away your free will, and I don't want to do that. At least, not anymore than I already have. Anyway, you've got the various super-heroes and magical girls to help you with that."

"Speaking of religion", you said, "I thought You might convert us all to Emily-Worship."

"Nah", She said. "So long as they're not killing each other over it, people can believe what they like about Who runs the Universe. "I know Who I AM.'

She smiled as if at a private joke.

"I re-wrote Twentieth and Twenty-First Century history, too. Took out all the ghastly bits, created a back-story for how people colonized the Solar System, and such."

Your walk had carried you past Saint Galadriel's Catholic Elementary School. The students were outside, having recess. It occurred to you that it was early in the day for that, but time seemed to flow differently around Emily.

As you watched, the students and faculty transformed into what looked like bipedal Komodo dragons. The sight of lizards wearing parochial school uniforms made you laugh.


"I spent last evening with My - Emily's- mortal family. My last time with them. When I left, I re-wrote their family history so they'd forget Emily. Instead, I gave them the son that even mortal Emily had known they'd always wanted."


She looked wistful. Apparently, even a Goddess could be a little sad.

You walked along quietly, until you came to Maguire's, a family restaurant, that was popular with just about everyone in town. You went in and had lunch, and Emily seemed to brighten up a bit.


After lunch, you walked some more, and found your way to the cottage by the pond in the park. You both chatted briefly with Lisa the Bench, and then went into the cottage. You and Emily removed your shoes - but nothing else - and lay down on the futon together. It was completely non-sexual. Instead, you had a feeling more like that of holding a sleeping child, although you knew that Emily didn't sleep anymore. You had the strangest sensation that something was ending, although you couldn't say what.

You dozed yourself for a while, to be awakened by the sound of the television.

Emily was sitting up, watching television. It appeared to be some kind of morning show from Japan. It was only after you'd been watching for a moment that you noticed that you could now understand, speak, read and write Japanese. A female reporter was interviewing a young actress. They were in a forest that the young thespian was apparently trying to protect from development. There was a small audience present as well.

As you watched, the young interviewer's ears moved up the sides of her head, becoming pointed cat ears. Her eyes became green with slitted pupils. Her teeth became cute fangs, and her and note feline in configuration. Her fingernails turned into claws, and a cat's tail peeked out from under her skirt.

As she spoke, she began adding "nya" to the end of her sentences.


In her turn, the actress began to change as well. Twin antennae grew from her forehead, and her eyes grew large and black. A second pair of arms grew from her torso, and membranous wings grew from her back. Her transformation into a queen bee-woman was complete as a large, apine abdomen project outward from her backside. A gigantic beehive materialized in the forest behind them. Female audience members and passersby transformed into worker bee women and began flying into and out of the hive, carrying out their duties for their new queen. Some of the nearby men and boys became drones, as well.

The reporter wrapped up her interview.

"Once again, thank you for your time, Your Majesty, nya!", the cat-girl said.

"It wazzzzz my pleazzzzzhure", the bee queen replied.

Emily turned off the TV, smiled at you, and said, "Let's go."

The pair of you left the cottage, said goodbye to Lisa the Bench, and left the park on the opposite side from which you'd entered. You began walking through an area of town that you hadn't spent much time in. Emily led you into a house.

"Don't worry", she said. "They won't see us. I babysat for them a few times."

A man and woman in their mid-30's entered the room, accompanied by an eight year-old girl who obviously their daughter. They had obviously been arguing.

"That's Stan and Jan Harrison, and the kid is Jeannie. This is the same argument they've had any number of times."

"Aw, you never let me do anything!", said Jeannie.

"Oh, please", said Jan. "You don't know how good you have it! I wish we could switch places with you, and you could be the hard-working mommy, and I could be the spoiled little brat!"

"Wish granted!", said Emily.

You watched as Jan began to shrink, growing younger, as Jeannie began to grow, becoming older. Their clothing altered as necessary while they changed. Finally, they had switched ages.

"Enough lip out of you, young lady", said Jeannie. "Go to your room!"

Young Jan stalked off in a huff. Emily led you out of the house.

"I always wanted to do that", she said.

"Say, is Jeannie married to her father, now?", you asked.

"Don't worry, I re-wrote their DNA, too", said Emily. "Anyway, let's go get some dinner."

She led you to Chateau Dutourd, a fancy - and expensive - French restaurant.

"I always wanted to eat here, once", said Emily. She walked up to a table where two young couples were looking at menus, deciding what to order. Emily smiled at them, and they turned into unicorns who trotted out of the restaurant, and began mating loudly outside.

You shrugged, sat down, and began looking at the menu.

The pair of you had a nice relaxed dinner. Emily thought your waitress had done such a good job that she tipped her by granting her fondest wish, which turned out to be being turned into a dragon the size of a mountain. The waitress/dragon was good enough to give the pair of you a ride home on her back.

Once you were home, Emily led you out by the in-ground swimming pool which had appeared at some point in back of your estate.

"Well, Adam", she said, "It's time for me to begin the next phase of my plan."

"Which will be...?", you prompted.
1341111113321211111121111121111111222312.title: The next day

1341111113321211111121111121111111222312.content:
"I've decided to stop manifesting physically here on Earth. I'll still be here - i'm everywhere - I'm just not gonna be present exactly the same way that I am now."

"What brought this on?"

"I want you to have a normal life - or, at least, what I've made 'normal', and you can't really have that with a goddess hanging around. My Angels will be coming with me, but I'll leave you the rest. My rooms will become your guest rooms. My bed, Jacqueline, and my chair, Danielle, will serve your guests as they've served me. Oh, and I've expanded the stable a bit. I took Pearl and her pals' boyfriends and turned them into stallions. They've all been mating enthusiastically. Don't worry, I've recruited more maids to serve as stable hands."

"Will you ever be back?"

"Adam, I'm not leaving as such, remember. Oh, and I'm gong to be re-writing your family history, a bit, and making you a bit older, adjusting your relative ages and such, just to simplify things a bit. I think you and Alyson ought to be twins, anyway. Don't worry, you'll get the time back on the other end. And I'm sorry, but I'm going to do something that I haven't done up to now."

"What's that?"

"I'm going to tamper with your mind a bit, and make you forget me."

"What? Why?"

"Well, it give you an unfair advantage if you're the only one who knows that a Goddess exists, don't you think? Don't worry, when the time comes, I'll be here to transition you to the afterlife personally. Hush now, no arguments. Come here."

She pulled your head down level with here, whispered "Goodbye, Adam", kissed you tenderly on the forehead, and then vanished.

You were alone, which - as far as you remembered - you had been since getting back from your after-supper walk an hour ago.

You decided to get ready for bed, so you went up to your room. It was a big day, tomorrow, after all - your wedding day. Actually, it was going to be a group wedding: You would be marrying Aileen and Megumi, Alyson would be marrying Brett and Matt, and your four friends would be marrying Alyson's four friends (Dave to Charlotte, Tom to Patricia, Ron to Elizabeth, and Phil to Hiltrud). After the ceremony, each of the new couples and trios would be going on separate honeymoons and when they came back, the Carters, Hrbeks, Jackson and Noguchis would be moving into new homes of their own. They'd been staying with you since you'd all graduated college, but now that you were settling down, it was agreed they'd want homes of their own.

No one was in your room - by old family tradition, a man always spent the night before his wedding alone. Your girls would be spending the night in the guest room, though they made sure to tease you about how they'd have to "comfort" each other in your absence. Gabi the Bed and Mary Elizabeth the Chair were still in your room physically, of course, but they would be mentally "visiting" Lisa the Bench until the morning.

You were excited - and the tiniest bit scared - at the thought of getting married. Of course, you and your (non-identical) twin sister Alyson always had done everything together, and now, at age 22, you were going to take the next steps in your lives together.

You picked up an old framed photograph of your family. It had been taken when you and Alyson were six, and Amy was two years old. At the time you were five normal humans, indistinguishable from the general run of mundanes. You were rich, of course, not that anyone was really poor, these days. Everyone at least had a comfortable, safe home, except for the very few who didn't want to own one, and even then, there were well-appointed public hostels that people could stay in. Still, some people were better off than others, and your family was counted among those people.

Things had started to change for your family shortly after the photo was taken.

The first change had come the next year. An epidemic of swole fever had swept through your town, and you and Alyson - along with about half the kids in your town - had both come down with it. Swole fever typically hit young children, affecting their metabolism, causing them to grow very large, develop massive muscles, and become very energetic, which was why they had to work out twice a day, to burn off their excess energy. Girls that caught it also developed extremely large breasts when they hit puberty. It had no other effects, and the children's health was not negatively affected. There was no cure or treatment, you just had to live with it. You laughed to yourself. You and Alyson had looked alike before the change - people had always that you looked like a male version of her, and that she looked like a female version of you, and after the change, you still did.

The next change had come a few years later, when Amy and her friends Theresa, Jane, Karishma, Louise and Mary-Anne, had rescued a fairy named Stutterfly form a spider's web in which had gotten herself entangled. Stutterfly had been so grateful that she had drenched her rescuers in fairy dust and cast a spell that was intended to grant them a lifetime of good luck. Unfortunately for the six girls, Stutterfly was known among her fellow fairies as "Stutterfly the Incompetent", and her spell had instead irrevocably turned them into fairies themselves. Other fairies had been consulted, and the girls had spent some time with them learning the ways of their new species.

Their shared experience had helped their already strong friendship grow into love, and the six young fairies had group-married each other the day they all turned 18, a few months before. All six of them had gotten pregnant almost immediately. You weren't sure how that worked, given that they were all girls. Of course, as far as you knew, all fairies were female. You presumed it must be some kind of a magical thing. They obviously knew how it worked, that was all that mattered, really.

The last change had happened right around the time that you and Alyson had started high school. Your parents had gotten heavily into New Age spirituality, and had hired a "spirit guide" to help them go on a "spirit journey" to contact their "spirit animals". You weren't sure why, but you and Aly suspected that it was to help them with a flagging love life. The guide they had chosen had something of a spotty track record. Some of his clients had returned from their "journeys" with a deep knowledge of their "spirit animals" - enough to get them jobs on ranches or at zoological gardens. Others had come back able to speak to or even control animals. At the other extreme others had transformed into animals themselves, some retaining their human intelligence, others not.

Your parents had been in the middle, coming back partially transformed, your father a man-horse (a different thing from a centaur), and your mother, a cougar-woman.

The whole thing was controversial, anyway, as reputable scientists and sorcerers cast doubt on how much the "guides" actually helped. Spontaneous transformation was an uncommon, but scientifically/magically verified phenomenon. (A girl that Aly had known in high school had crushed on a merboy so hard that she had turned into a mermaid herself, only to then discover that he was gay. From what you'd heard, it had worked out for her after a fashion. At least, she had last been heard of living with a young mermaid who had "comforted" her after her great let-down.)

As for your parents, their transformations had sharply enhanced libidos and sharply reduced inhibitions, leaving them with an unfortunate tendency to start banging away merrily when they got the least bit aroused, no matter where they were, or who was present. It could be embarrassing, to say the least. If it wasn't for the fact that your mother and father were no longer interfertile, you'd probably have at least another four or five siblings.

You were startled out of your reverie by a knock at the door. You answered, and it was Stephanie, your chief maid. Like all of your maids, Stephanie was an agelock. Agelocks were girls - and it was always girls- who suffered from a syndrome whose cause was unknown. Agelocks stopped aging physically at puberty - typically around the age of twelve - and never got any older, or grew anymore. They never got their period, and could never have children. They weren't immortal, but tended to live around five hundred years. Stephanie had initially been hired as a nanny for your infant great-great-grandfather, and barring the unforeseen, would live to see your great-great-grandchildren, and then some. By an ancient tradition, agelocks mostly went into domestic service, except for a few who went into professions where a person with a child's body and an adult mind was useful. As with swole fever, there was no known cure for agelock.

"Will you be needing anything else this evening, sir?", she asked.

"Thank you, no, Stephanie", you replied.

"Very good, sir", said Stephanie. "Britney's on night duty, should anything come up."

"Thank you, Stephanie. good night."

"Good night, sir."
1341111113321211111121111121111111222312.title: Emily's Plan

"I guess we may not get a work-out in this evening", said Alyson.

"I guess we'll just have to burn off our excess energy some other way", you smirked.

1341111113321211111121111121111111222312.title: In the morning

1341111113321211111121111121111111222312.content:
You went back to your room to get dressed. Your day seemed to simultaneously last forever and fly by. Finally, the moment came when you saw all the brides-to-be in their wedding dresses. Charlotte, Patricia, Elizabeth and Hiltrud looked amazing, and Alyson was downright indescribable.

Then you saw Aileen and Megumi. They were visions in white - Aileen in a Western-style wedding gown, and Megumi in a shiromuku -and so beautiful that stopped breathing for a moment and nearly fainted. It nearly broke your mind - these glorious women were about to marry you! If it took everything you had, you would spend the rest of your life striving to be worthy of them both.

The ceremony was performed by the Reverend Emily MacDonald, the retiring pastor of your church. You'd known her your whole life - she'd performed the weddings of your parents and both sets of your grandparents. She didn't look a day over sixty, although she was ninety if she was a day. You liked her - she was truly a great woman. She had an appealing smile, though she always looked as though she knew some great secret that no one else did.Your group wedding was going to be the last duty she would perform before going off to travel the Solar System in retirement.

The ceremony went off quite well. Your parents managed to behave themselves, although they vanished for a few minutes after the ceremony and returned looking flushed.

The reception went off reasonably well, too, although once the drinking started, your parents' control slipped a bit, but fortunately, a few other people's control slipped as well, so they didn't stand out so much. Your were just glad that your family didn't follow the old custom of public consummations.

As you all prepared to leave for your respective honeymoons, Pastor Emily came over to give you all one last blessing. After she'd spoken to all the others, she whispered in your ear:

"Congratulations, Adam, I know you will all have long, happy lives together."

With that, she left.
1341111113321211111121111121111111222312.title: One thing

1341111113321211111121111121111111222312.content:
You went off on your three-month honeymoon right after the ceremony. Your first night was spent at the local luxury hotel,and the next morning, you flew to Los Angeles, where you caught a submarine to New Atlantis, an undersea resort run by merfolk. You visited Japan, Ireland, and resorts on the Moon and Mars. By the time you came home to start you new life together, Aileen and Megumi was both pregnant. Alyson and the other brides were all pregnant as well. You went to work for your father's business, and inn what seemed like a very short time, your wives gave birth to what would be the first of many, many children. You lived a long, prosperous life, finally living to see your great-great-grandchildren. There was some sorrow, of course. You outlived most of the mortals you had known, including both of your wives, but that was the inevitable price of long life.

Then, one day, shortly after your 131st birthday, you were dozing in Mary Elizabeth the Chair when you heard a voice call your name.

"Adam, wake up, it's time to go."

A radiantly beautiful woman stood in front of you. Behind her were Aileen and Megumi, looking as beautiful as the day you'd married them. Suddenly, you recognized Her.

"Emily?"

"That's right. Come on, now, sleepyhead, it's time for you to see what's next."

Aileen and Megumi each took one of your arms as you got up out of the chair. You left your old body behind, as you seemed to have acquired a new, young healthy one. The three of you walked together as Emily led you where only She could lead you.
