"No, as far as they're concerned, they've always been merfolk. Only in special cases do I want people to know what's been done to them. Plus, lif eon land has been getting pretty crowded."

Adam/Marie listened in astonishment.

"Maîtresse, you just created ...une espèce entière - une civilisation entière!"

"Mais bien sûr",replied Amy. "You think that's big, watch this."

Beach Road disappeared, and the limousine was suddenly hovering above a barren, reddish landscape.

"Welcome to Mars!", said Amy. Something began spreading across the landscape - after a moment, Adam/Marie realized that it was a strange form of plant life.

"There", said Amy, "I've terraformed the planet - at least to an extent - now I'll populate it."

Two people appeared on the surface of the planet, stark naked. Adam/Marie didn't recognize them, but the man seemed to be Chinese - or maybe Korean - and the woman seemed to be African, although s/he couldn't have guessed what part of Africa.

The couple's skin turned green, and their hair vanished. Their ears grew points, and antennae sprouted from their foreheads. They shrank until they were each about three feet tall.

"Can't have Mars without little green men - and women", said Amy. More Martians appeared, as did buildings of a style that neither of the two servants had ever seen before.

"I've recruited another billion people from Earth to populate Mars", continued Amy. "I'm just setting up a society for them here, and adjusting things back on Earth. Don't worry, they'll still think of Earth people as their kindred. Anyway, now for Venus."

The limo vanished from Mars, and reappeared over Venus. Alyson/Frederick and Adam/Marie watched as the planet's atmosphere and surface were re-mixed. When this was done, the limo flew down to the surface. Another couple appeared in front of them. The man looked Swedish, the woman was a Cuban-american that Adam/Marie recognized as working in a local bakery. The couple's skin turned orange, and their hair vanished. Their ears grew points, and antennae sprouted from their foreheads. They grew until they were each about seven feet tall.

As if answering an un-asked question, Amy said, "I figured big orange people would make a nice contrast to little green people. I recruited two billion more people to populate Venus. things will be a lot less crowded back on earth."

Suddenly, they were hovering above the surface of the Moon. A series of interconnected lights crisscrossed the Lunar surface.

"I set up some Lunar habitats, too" Amy explained. "that'll do for now, but I may do the other planets. later."


The limo was back on Beach Road. When they got home, their mansion and it surrounding grounds were even larger.

I hope I'm not expected to clean all that single-handed., thought Adam/Marie.

"Don't worry", said Amy. "I'll be recruiting more staff eventually."

When they got back inside, Amy went off to her room, while Alyson/Frederick and Adam/Marie began doing various chores -somehow they just knew what to do and how to do it.

When suppertime came, they joined Amy in a huge dining hall. They were privileged to eat with their mistress, served by Trinh.

After supper, they went and watched TV, seeing reports from Earth, the Moon, Mars and Venus. Afterwards,Amy dismissed them for the evening.

Once they were away from Amy, Alyson/Frederick pulled Adam/Marie aside, and said, "Marie, we need to talk."

"Très bien mon ami, but where?", asked Adam/Marie.

"Come into my room", said Alyson/Frederick.

The two went into Alyson/Frederick's room.

"We need to think about what we're going to do about Amy."

"Oui, but what can we do?" This power of hers, how can we resist it?"

"I don't know", replied Alyson/Frederick. "But what she's doing with her powers. I ,mean, she's always had an odd sense of humor, but this..."

Forget, echoed Amy's voice in their heads. Remember two minutes after you wake up tomorrow morning.

Marie smiled suggestively at Frederick, and said, "Why, Frederick, here I am, alone with you in your bedroom. My goodness, anything could happen!"

Frederick took her in his hands, and said, "Ah, my dear, I certainly hope so..."

Marie woke up the next morning -which was Sunday -with her naked body nestled next to Frederick's. She smiled as she remembered the fun they'd had the night before. She wondered if they had time for another round before the Maîtresse needed them. Frederick smiled back, but then they sprang apart as they remembered.

"She did it to us again!", said Alyson/Frederick.

"I wish she'd have you wear un préservatif", said Adam/Marie. "No offense, but I don't want to end up enceinte with your baby."

"I don't want it either, Marie", said Alyson/Frederick, "But I don't know what we can do."

Get up and get dressed, you two. It's time for breakfast.

They got up , showered and got dressed, and joined Amy at breakfast. Once they were done, she said:

"Alright, it's time for..."
14411211121231.title: Going home

144112111212311.content:
Amy' clothes vanished, instantly replaced by what looked like the Queen's "Sunday Best". The three of them went outside, where Alicia had the limo ready. The three rode to the local church, which was St. Galadriel's. Only, it wasn't St. Galadriel's anymore. The sign out front now read, "Amyopolis City First Church of the Goddess Amy".

"'Amyopolis', Mistress?", asked Alyson/Frederick.

Amy smiled. "Hey, I'm a goddess, I'm allowed to name things after myself. You to go on in ahead, I have to make an entrance."

Alyson/Frederick and Adam/Marie went into the church. The interior was very ornate. Adam/Marie noticed pictures of Amy in various poses on the walls. There was no altar at the front of the church, only a fancy throne.

They turned as Amy entered the church, and then gaped in shock. She was literally glowing. Now, she really looked like a goddess. She walked to the front of the church at a leisurely, as the congregation sang a hymn in praise of her. She sat in throne, smiling at her worshipers.

Father Mike got up and gave a sermon in praise of Amy. they sang another hymn, and then Amy stood and said, "Now, a Judgement."

The air itself seemed to glow, and a wave of energy passed over the congregation. Some of the people were unaffected. Others changed, becoming older or younger, changing colors, changing size or changing form. The Harper family - Bill and Elaine, Teenage daughter Charlotte, and little Melissa - turned into satyrs. Old Man Hochstetter turned into a swarm of flies that flew out of the church. Wanda Muraco, who had been the local librarian for about fifty years and was probably the most beloved person in town, de-aging until she looked about twenty-one and achingly beautiful. A halo appeared over her head and gorgeous wings sprouted from her back. Some people just disappeared.

The service ended, and they left the church.

"Maîtresse, une question, s'il vous plaît", said Adam/Marie.

"Go ahead", said Amy.

"I understand what you did to Madame Muraco, but what you did to Monsieur Hochstetter?"

"Remember how the older kids used to tell us to avoid him?", said Amy, her face dark. "There was good reason."

Next...
144112111212311.title: "Church!"

1441121112123113.content:
"May I ask a question, too, Mistress?", said Alyson/Frederick.

"OK."

"Is Amy-Worship a major religion, now?"

"Actually, it's the only religion. Amy-Worship is now universal. Every house of worship on Earth is now dedicated to me. I've eliminated all the world's religious disputes."

"Is our church like the Vatican, now, Mistress, since you appear there in person?"

"I appear in person in every church. I can be in as many places at once as I like."

After giving them a moment to absorb that, Amy said, "I think I feel like doing some horse riding. Sheffield, take us to the nearest riding trails."

They arrived at the local riding academy. Amy, Alyson/Frederick and Adam/Marie walked to the stables. As they did, their outfits morphed into riding clothes. They saw an older woman talking to three eighteen year-old girls in riding clothes.

The older woman turned to Amy, and said, "Good afternoon, My Lady, thank You for honoring us with Your presence. I'm Margaret Hayes, the manager here. These young ladies are Louise Worthington, Tiffany Donne-Forbes and Patricia Dutourd, three of our prize students here."

"Excellent", said Amy. "I'll take them."


The three young women's outfits vanished, and they fell over onto all fours. Tails sprouted from their rear ends, and their hands and feet turned into hooves. Their limbs re-shaped themselves and their torsos expanded. Lastly, their necks expanded and their faces lengthened. The three beautiful young mares stood docilely as saddles, bridles and shoes materialized on their bodies. Amy and her servants mounted them and rode away.

Adam/Marie knew that s/he had never ridden before, and was pretty sure that Amy and Alyson/Frederick never had either, but all three rode like experts. They rode for a while, and then had a picnic lunch together. They rode for a while more, and they went back to the car. As soon as they dismounted, the three mares vanished, and the Amy and her servants' clothing morphed back to what it had been before they arrived.

"Mistress, did you return them to normal?", asked Alyson/Frederick.

"Oh, no", said Amy. "I 'annexed' some more land to our 'estate', built a stable on it, and 'recruited' some of our neighbors to be stable hands. Once someone's mine, they're mine forever."


"Anyway",. she continued. "It's time to..."
1441121112123113.title: Something else

14411211121231131.content:
Amy had Alicia drive them home. Alyson/Frederick and and Adam/Marie were occupied with chores for a few hours until suppertime, When they heard Amy's voice in their heads:


Dress for dinner, you two.

The pair of them found themselves both going to Alyson/Frederick's room. They soon found that it was now their joint quarters. Obviously, Amy had decided that they were a couple.

Sighing, they dressed for dinner. There seemed to be no way for them to fight her whims.

After dinner, the three watched television together, until Amy said, "Make an early night of it, you two. We've got school tomorrow."


"'School', Mistress?", said Alyson/Frederick. "I'm surprised you'd even bother with that."

"I won't be going long-term, but I have some loose ends to wrap up., Now, forget, and remember when you wake up in the morning."

Frederick and Marie left the room, and went to bed, but didn't go to sleep for another hour. The next morning, they woke up in each other's arms, naked. This time, when they remembered , they simply sighed and got up and showered.
14411211121231131.title: "Go home"

144112111212311312.content:
On Monday morning, Alicia drove Amy, Alyson/Frederick and Adam/Marie to what was now called Amyopolis High School. As they walked into the school, they spotted Nancy Papadopoulos, Amy's best friend. Nancy was short, heavy-set and dark-haired. She and Amy had been best friends since kindergarten. Nancy had dreams of being a singer, but admitted herself that she had a terrible singing voice.

When Nancy saw Amy, she smiled and said, "Hey, Ames!"

"Hey, Nance!", said Amy rushing to hug her friend. As she did so, Nancy began to grow, aging until, like Amy, she was a beautiful twenty-one year-old woman.

"Sing for me, Nance", said Amy.

Nancy began to sing, and to Adam/Marie's astonishment, her voice was the most amazing, sweet and beautiful like being immersed in warm, liquid honey. It was hypnotic, and everyone around stopped and listened. the spell was broken when another limo pulled up, and Nancy broke away form Amy, and said, "Gotta go, I'm performing at the Metropolitan Opera later, and I have to go get ready."

Amy bade farewell to her friend, and continued into the school.

"Mistress, do the people you change know what's happened to them?", asked Alyson/Frederick.

"Usually, no", replied Amy. "Most of them just think that's the way they've always been. Only in special cases - like you two - do they notice what I've done to them."

They walked into Amy's home room. Just inside the door, a tall red-headed girl stood, looking daggers at Amy. this was Maureen Fitgerald, Amy's arch-enemy for almost as long as she'd known Nancy. Adam/Marie had never been quite sure, but the two loathed each other. S/he had a feeling that something bad was about to happen to Maureen.


"OK, 'Goddess', what's going on, how are you doing this? What's going on? all this weird stuff happening, and at church yesterday, everyone - even my family, worshiping your sorry butt. How are you pulling this off?" The words poured out of Maureen."

"Simple", said Amy. "I'm a goddess, now."

"Yeah, right,"

"Look at Jill Whitman."

Jill was a small, not to say scrawny girl, the very definition of of a shy, mousy little bookworm. She had hre nose buried in a book, as if hoping no one would pay attention to her. However, as they watched, her body began to swell, as her muscles grew, and grew, and grew, until she was nearly seven feet tall, and would've made the She-Hulk look tiny if she'd been in the room. Fortunately for her, her clothing and desk grew in proportion. While this was happening, she went on reading, although her book now looked like a postage stamp in her hands..

"Good morning, Jill!", said Amy.

OH, HI, AMY!, said Jill, in a voice that could have taken the siding off of house.

"Damn", said Maureen. "I didn't want to believe it, but it's true."

To her credit, she didn't grovel, but instead was defiant. "So, I suppose it's my turn now, is it? Well, do your worst! I suppose I'll be your salve, constantly telling you how great you are?"

"No", said Amy, "I think it would be more fun to leave your mind intact."

Maureen's clothes vanished. Her toes morphed, becoming a bird's talons, her breasts sank back into her chest, and her arms morphed into wings. Feathers sprouted all over her body and her mouth and nose turned into a parrot's beak. She shrank down to parrot-size and flew over and perched on Amy's left shoulder.

Amy produced a cracker from nowhere, and said, "Maureen wanna cracker?"

"Oh, shut up!", squawked Maureen, but she took the proffered treat and began to chow down.

Amy sat down, with Maureen still perched on her shoulder, and Adam/Marie and Alyson/Frederick standing at attention behind her.

Her home room teacher, Ms.Lamb, who taught English, came in. She was in her late fifties, heavy-set with graying hair. she took the role, and began teaching. As she did so, her hair turned into wool, which spread all over her body, even as her clothing vanished. Her ears lengthened, and her mouth and nose lengthened. Her hands and feet turned into hooves. As the class ended, she dropped to all fours, completely transformed into a sheep. She baa'd and then vanished.

"Mistress, why?", asked Alyson/Frederick.

"Oh, it was just her name", said Amy. "I thought it would be funny."

"Où l'avez-vous envoyée, Maîtresse?", asked Adam/Marie.

"I sent her to our menagerie", said Amy. "Oh, and we have a menagerie, now."

Her next class was quiet, and all Amy did was to turn all of the boys in the room into girls, and turn the math teacher, Ms. Hanscomb, into a snake from the waist down.

In the hallway between classes, Billy Daly bumped into her, because he wasn't looking where he was going.

"Watch it, you jackass!", said Amy. Billy's clothing vanished, he dropped to all fours, and transformed into a donkey.

"Hee-haw!", he said, before Amy sent him to his new home in her menagerie.

Amy's next period was free, so she went into the library. Deborah Jones, head of the cheerleading squad, was sitting with her best friend, Yvonne Pierce.. They were mocking Belinda Johnson, a heavy girl who was a popular target of theirs..

"Look at that fat cow!", said Deborah, "It's a wonder she can even moooooo!"

Her clothing vanished, and her breasts migrated down her abdomen, morphing into udders. Her torso began to swell as her hands and feet swelled into hooves. Short horns grew from her head as her face began to change. Once Deborah had finished changing into a cow, Yvonne's clothing disappeared, replaced by a milk maid's outfit. A stool appeared next to Deborah, and a pail appeared in Yvonne's hands. She sat down on the stool and began milking her friend. After watching this a moment, Amy sent them to their new home in her private dairy. Amy looked at Belinda, whose body re-shaped itself to fit the accepted ideal of feminine beauty. Belinda became the new head of the cheerleading squad.

Next...
144112111212311312.title: At school

1441121112123113122.content:
Lunchtime came, and Amy, with Maureen still perched on her shoulder, led Adam/Marie and Alyson/Frederick to the cafeteria.

Amy looked around for a table, and chose where she would sit. The fact that six guys were already sitting there meant little to her. Adam/Marie recognized them as a group of guys who were big comics fans. As Amy looked at them, they transformed in various kinds of super-heroes - a masked avenger type, and All-American crusader type, and so on. One even became a manga-style magical girl.

They stood up, and said as one:

"Justice calls!"

Then they literally flew out of the cafeteria. Amy sat down and sent her servants to fetch her lunch, and theirs.

When the two of them rejoined Amy, Adam/Marie said:

"Maîtresse, what did you do to those boys?"

"I turned them all into super-heroes, obviously. Each one the kind of hero - or heroine - he'd always dreamed of being. In fact, I created thousands of super-heroes all over the Earth, and as many super-villains to fight them."

"Villains, Maîtresse?"

"Well, yeah, gotta have villains for heroes to fight. Don't worry, it'll be like in those old Super-Friends cartoons that Granddad used to make us watch. No one will get hurt, and there won't be any serious property damage. The villains will scheme, the heroes will always win, but the villains will always come back for more. They'll all get to have fun, and it will never get too dark. That reminds me, though."

She closed her eyes for a moment, then opened them, and smiled.


"May I ask what you did, Mistress?", inquired Alyson/Frederick.

"Oh, I just let everyone out of prison who was imprisoned unjustly. Then I took all the people who were never going to reform and turned them all into trees. They'll live much longer and more productive lives that way. Now, the only people in prison are the ones who went wrong, but who, with help, can be set right. Also, I made sure that the prisons had the facilities they needed to help the remaining inmates."

"This is your justice, Mistress?"

"Justice is what I say it is", replied Amy, returning to her lunch.

The chattering of four girls at the table behind them irritated them. Suddenly, they stopped speaking and began clucking like hens. Their clothing disappeared as they shrank down to chicken size. Their bodies began to change, their feet becoming hen's feet, and their arms morphine into wings, even as feathers grew over their bodies. Combs grew from the tops of their heads, and wattles dropped down from their jowls. Finally, their lips hardened and projected outward, forming beaks. The four hens vanished, taking their places in Amy's dairy, alongside Deborah the Cow.

As they finished their lunch, an announcement came over the intercom: "There will be a special assembly at 1:30 p.m. All students and faculty will please report to the auditorium at 1:30 p.m."

"I don't remember an assembly today, Mistress", said Alyson/Frederick.

"That's because I just called it", said Amy.

Amy took her time finishing her lunch. She found it especially good, so she made all the cafeteria workers millionaires, and sent them home early.

By the time they found their way to the auditorium, all of the students and faculty were seated, waiting expectantly. When he saw Amy and her entourage enter the room, Principal Higgins said, "The goddess will now address you all." He then turned into an owl and flew away.

Amy, with Adam/Marie and Alyson/Frederick behind her, marched up to the podium. A birdcage materialized around Maureen, and Amy handed the cage with the parrot in it to Adam/Marie.

She smiled at them, and said, "I've always wanted to do this."

Amy turned around, grabbed the microphone, shoved the podium aside, struck a "rock star" pose, and sang: "SCHOOOOOOOOOL'S OUT FOR -EVAHHHH!"


As had happened in church, the students and faculty began to transform. Some, Amy's friends and favorite teachers, became living Venuses and/or Adonises, dressed in their finest clothes, before being teleported to their new palatial homes. Others changed size and/or colors and some swapped genders. Others turned into various animals, (including some dinosaurs and other prehistoric animals) and others into creatures out of myth and legend. Adam/Marie recognized centaurs, leprechauns, elves, orcs, satyrs and creatures from around the world. Others turned into things he'd never seen before. One girl transformed into a majestic, golden-scaled dragon. A few simply disappeared.

Once the transformations were complete, the transformees left the auditorium.

"That'll make for some surprises for their families", squawked Maureen.

"I transformed a lot of their family members, too", said Amy. "I thought the world could use more different kinds of creatures in it."


The school building disappeared, and they found themselves standing in an open field.

Amy breathed in the fresh air, and said:
1441121112123113122.title: Lunchtime

14411211121231131222.content:
"Let's go to the park", said Amy. Alicia drove them to the park. Amy left Maureen in the car with Alicia. She, Adam/Marie and Alyson/Frederick strolled through the park, enjoying the pleasant day.

After a while, Amy decided she wanted to sit down. "Someplace with a little shade would be nice", she said.

She saw a teenage couple sitting on a bench. The couple stood up as the bench disappeared. They embraced each other, and began to kiss. Their clothing vanished, but the duo did not seem to notice. Large grayish-brown roots grew from their feet, growing into the ground. The skin of their legs began to change into tree bark. As the change spread, their four legs merged into a single tree trunk. As the change reached their torso, the pair spread their arms wide. The change spread up their arms, and leaves sprouted from their fingertips as their arms turned into branches.. Finally, the change reached their heads, which merged into one. The new tree grew until any resemblance to a pair of human beings was lost.

"Now, they'll never be apart", said Amy.

A large checked cloth appeared on the ground. Amy and her sibling/servants sat down in the shade of the transformed lovers. A picnic basket appeared, and Amy began unpacking it. The three of them enjoyed a tasty picnic.

Next:
14411211121231131222.title: "Now for our next stop."

144112111212311312222.content:
The remnants of the picnic disappeared as Amy led Adam/Marie and Alyson/Frederick further into the park. Adam/Marie saw two girls s/he knew up ahead of them. One was Emily LoPresti, a girl Adam had known casually. She was sitting on a park bench, reading. The other was Sarah Harper, , Adam's old girlfriend, who was walking her dog.

"There's your ex", said Amy. "Wow, she really wanted your body! Well, she can have it."

Amy smiled, and Sarah's body morphed into an exact replica of Adam's old body. she - now, he - walked over to where Emily was sitting.

"Hah, that Emily wanted your body, too", said Amy. "Well, she can have it, too. I never did understand why so many girls were nuts about you. "

Sarah/Adam leaned over and kissed Emily. "Hey, sweetie", s/he said. "I'm through walking Skipper. you ready to head out?"

"Sure, hon",. said Emily, putting her book away. The young couple walked away, arm in arm.

Amy smiled at them fondly, and said, " Now..."
144112111212311312222.title: More fun in the park

1441121112123113122221.content:
Once they'd gotten home, Amy gathered Adam/Marie, Alyson/Frederick and Maureen the parrot, and said, "Well, I've gotten all of the 'personal amusement' stuff out of the way. No it's time to finish up re-writing human history."

"What do you mean, mistress?", asked Alyson/Frederick..

"Hang on", said Amy, "I'm just doing it. I've re-written all of world history. Now, as far as everyone except us is concerned, I've ruled as the absolute Goddess/Empress of the Solar System for all of world history. Not only is there no more war, there never was any war, ever. Just my benevolent rule, then, now and forever."

Amy left them to their duties until suppertime. Alyson/Frederick and Adam/Marie found that their home was now even larger. However, they also found that they each now had several subordinates. Adam/Marie recognized the maids who were now his subordinates as a mixture of people who had irritated him over the years him over the years (girls who had rejected him, old teacher she hadn't liked and even a few guys who had bullied him, now all transformed into pretty young women) and actresses and girl singers that Adam had been infatuated with, but who all did nothing for Marie. Doubtless, this was Amy's idea of humor.

After supper, they sat down to watch the evening news. The anchorwoman, a pretty blonde in her early thirties, began to speak.

"Good evening, everyone, Hail Amy! This is Poopyface von Stinkybutt with the news, hyuk-hyuk-hyuk!"." As she spoke, her skin turned chalk-white, red spots appeared on her cheeks, and her lips became exaggeratedly large and bright red. Her hair turned into rainbow-colored yarn, and her clothes became a brightly-colored clown outfit.

"You know, Mistress", said Alyson/Frederick, "for a goddess, you still have a juvenile side."

Amy simply laughed.

That night, Adam/Marie found hirself going to bed with Alyson/Frederick without being made to forget. S/he had to admit that s/he was getting used to it - Alyson/Frederick was quite good at it, and Amy would just force them anyway, if they didn't play along.

Weeks went by. Marie and Frederick began to accept who they were now. They didn't forget their old lives, but they stopped fighting who they were now. Marie had other things on her mind. It was over a month since she'd been sleeping with Frederick, and it had occurred to her that "that time of the month" hadn't arrived. Plus, she was tired all the time.

She took Frederick aside, and said, "Frederick, je crois que je suis enceinte."

Before Frederick could answer, they heard Amy's voice in their heads:

Yes, Marie, you are pregnant. Come to my office.

Marie and Frederick went to Amy's office.

"Don't worry, Marie", said Amy. "Your pregnancies will always be trouble-free."

"'Pregnancies', Maîtresse?", asked Marie.

"Oh, yes", said Amy. "You're going to have a lot of babies, and lots of descendants, overall. Eventually, all of the human race will be descended from the pair of you, at least in part."

"What will become of us, Mistress?", asked Frederick.

"Oh, you two will live nice long human lifespans, then I'll give you a nice retirement by turning you into redwood saplings,. let you spend a few thousand years as trees. Then, we'll see. Maybe I'll reincarnate you."

Frederick and Marie looked at one another in astonishment.

Next...
1441121112123113122221.title: "It's time to go home."

choices: You run enough distence to escape Amy's behind.
1442.content:
You wake up in your bed. Well that was weird... You quickly get your senses back and notice the sheets for your bed are HUGE! This is your bed, but it looks a lot bigger. Or maybe you're just smaller? Are you still dreaming?

Suddenly, you notice a gigantic figure standing beside your bed. It's Amy from your dream, wearing the exact same thing she was before. So you must be dreaming... right?

You notice as the giantess acknowledges your presence and lets out a slight giggle before starting to bend her knees. What's she doing...

She's sitting! Amy's about to sit on your bed right on top of you!
1442.title: You wake up at the size of half an inch.

choices: You're still dreaming... double-dreams are the worst. You wake up normally.
You're still dreaming... but wake up at the same size! When does it end?
14421.content:
You look up in a panic, your eyes fixating on the titanic rear slowly coming down towards you. You try to get up, to move, to run away... only to find your limbs paralyzed, stuck like in your dream. You are still dreaming! That's it. You close your eyes, trying to wake up. Only you don't.

Eyes snapping open, you barely have time to gasp as the shorts-clad ass of your teenage sister settles on you, pressing down on your shrunken form with indescribable pressure. The pain you feel... it can't be a dream; you don't feel pain in dreams, right? Well, this dream has pain. Lots of it. Amy begins to wiggle her butt, doubtless in an effort to make your situation worse. If so, it works.

Your sister giggles above you. "Good morning, LITTLE brother...~ Have a nice dream?"
14421.title: Amy sits right on you.

1443.content:
An unbearable burst of pain hits your entire body as her mammoth foot crushes you into nothing. The pain is shockingly real for being a simple dream; so real, in fact, that you finally pull yourself out of your slumber, awakening with bloodcurdling shriek. Sweat drips from your brow as you sit up, trying to regain composure after that horrible nightmare. It is then that you notice your little sister Amy. She's sitting casually at the end of your bed, staring at you with a smile.

"Havin' a bad dream there, Adam?" she asks.

"Yeah, it was pretty vivid for a nightmare," you reply.

You rub your drenched forehead in relief. The realization that Amy was only in your dream because your unconscious body heard her come in makes you feel better somehow. It certainly doesn't explain the pain of it all but you brush that off as part of your imagination.

"Yeah, giants can be scary, right?" Amy says.

"Yu- wait, I never said anything about giants..."

Ignoring your question, Amy stands up, towering over your reclining body. It reminds you of the dream in a way though without the imminent fear of death.
